item.description:
Presented by Friends of India Point Park at India Point Park Imagine dancers, music on stage with Roger Williams there right beside you. Imagine an afternoon in the park, filled with poetry sites theater and skits. There will also be music, dance, boat rides and much more.

Send a poem specific to the day to Origamipoets.org for small book publication and to read on the day or write a play or a skit for the day send it to GoodNEWSRI@gmail.com for consideration.

Tickets: Free

Times: 1pm - 6pm

Official Website: http://www.goproviden...
item.name: What Cheer? in the Park
